channel.title: CVE Feed for Airspan -- AirVelocity
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Airspan -- AirVelocity

item.title: CVE-2022-36307|2024-08-03T10:00:04.239Z -- airspan -- airvelocity
item.description: The AirVelocity 1500 prints SNMP credentials on its physically accessible serial port during boot. This was fixed in AirVelocity 1500 software version 15.18.00.2511 and may affect other AirVelocity and AirSpeed models.

item.title: CVE-2022-36312|2024-08-03T10:00:04.350Z -- airspan -- airvelocity
item.description: Airspan AirVelocity 1500 software version 15.18.00.2511 lacks CSRF protections in the eNodeB's web management UI. This issue may affect other AirVelocity and AirSpeed models.

item.title: CVE-2022-36310|2024-08-03T10:00:04.322Z -- airspan -- airvelocity
item.description: Airspan AirVelocity 1500 software prior to version 15.18.00.2511 had NET-SNMP-EXTEND-MIB enabled on its snmpd service, enabling an attacker with SNMP write abilities to execute commands as root on the eNodeB. This issue may affect other AirVelocity and AirSpeed models.

item.title: CVE-2022-36309|2024-08-03T10:00:04.309Z -- airspan -- airvelocity
item.description: Airspan AirVelocity 1500 software versions prior to 15.18.00.2511 have a root command injection vulnerability in the ActiveBank parameter of the recoverySubmit.cgi script running on the eNodeB's web management UI. This issue may affect other AirVelocity and AirSpeed models.

item.title: CVE-2022-36308|2024-08-03T10:00:04.241Z -- airspan -- airvelocity
item.description: Airspan AirVelocity 1500 web management UI displays SNMP credentials in plaintext on software versions older than 15.18.00.2511, and stores SNMPv3 credentials unhashed on the filesystem, enabling anyone with web access to use these credentials to manipulate the eNodeB over SNMP. This issue may affect other AirVelocity and AirSpeed models.

item.title: CVE-2022-36311|2024-08-03T10:00:04.384Z -- airspan -- airvelocity
item.description: Airspan AirVelocity 1500 prior to software version 15.18.00.2511 is vulnerable to injection leading to XSS in the SNMP community field in the eNodeB's web management UI. This issue may affect other AirVelocity and AirSpeed models.

item.title: CVE-2022-36306|2024-08-03T10:00:04.280Z -- airspan -- airvelocity
item.description: An authenticated attacker can enumerate and download sensitive files, including the eNodeB's web management UI's TLS private key, the web server binary, and the web server configuration file. These vulnerabilities were found in AirVelocity 1500 running software version 9.3.0.01249, were still present in 15.18.00.2511, and may affect other AirVelocity and AirSpeed models.
